text: This is a list of newspapers in Nigeria. The list includes print and online newspapers currently published in Nigeria that have national circulation or that are major local newspapers. ==List== Below are list of Newspapers in Nigeria. As the need for this Wiki, some will still appear on red link till creation. *Independent Nigeria *The Will (newspaper) *Prime 9ja Online *Vanguard Newspaper *The Sun (Nigeria) *This Day *The Guardian (Nigeria) *Pulse Nigeria *The Punch *The Nation (Nigeria) *SundiataPost ==Notes== ==References== Category:Newspapers published in Nigeria
title: Newspapers published in Nigeria
